official_title: To amend the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, to provide for more equitable treatment of a Regional Maritime Academy.

summary.text: Amends the Merchant Marine Act, 1936 to set the cap on annual payments to regional maritime academies which meet certain requirements at $200,000.

titles.title: To amend the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, to provide for more equitable treatment of a Regional Maritime Academy.
